dmca.title: BareFeetShop/Sony - Retraction
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Misha Fletcher [mailto:misha@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, June 06, 2006 3:07 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: BareFeetShop/Sony - Retraction
Subject: BareFeetShop/Sony - Retraction


To Whom It May Concern 

Please accept the below as a notice of retraction and please close all
cases regarding www.barefeetshop.com and Sony. 
________________________________


June 6, 2006

 

 

 

Designated Agent

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 

1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

abuse@theplanet.com
copyright@theplanet.com
legal-response@theplanet.com
<mailto:abuse@theplanet.comcopyright@theplanet.comlegal-response@theplan
et.com> 

 

Re: Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property : BareFeetShop/Sony

 

To Whom It May Concern:

 

This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent
referencing www.barefeetshop.com <http://www.barefeetshop.com/>  and our
client Sony. We have been in discussion with your client and he has
agreed to comply with our request. Please accept this letter as a notice
of retraction and all cases concerning www.barefeetshop.com
<http://www.barefeetshop.com/>  and Sony can be closed. 

 

Sincerely, 

 

Misha Fletcher

LMS Department Manager

Net Enforcers, Inc. 

Misha@netenforcers.com

Compliance.Management@netenforcers.com
